features.title: Prestigious Business Address

industry_content.industry_paragraph: Opus helps attorneys and law firms maintain a professional, credible presence. Enjoy a real business address, dedicated phone line, and professional live call answering to handle and route client inquiries and other calls. Need a private space for meetings or conference calls? Book one of our meeting rooms whenever you need to.
Select a prestigious address from our 650+ U.S locations for your law firm and use it to receive mail and packages with confidence.

The Opus all-inclusive package includes a professional business number, fax line, and a prestigious office address, ideal for solo attorneys, law firm startups, lawyers transitioning to hybrid or remote legal services, or established firms expanding their practice.

Opus offers unlimited US-based Live Call Answering for law firms! From existing to potential clients, our live receptionists will route calls on behalf of your law firm at a flat monthly rate.

All incoming calls are greeted professionally with a customized greeting, answered in your firm’s name, and routed properly. This enhances your client’s experience while freeing attorneys’ time to focus on billable work.
Our receptionists will filter out telemarketing and spam calls, allowing you and your team to focus on genuine leads and current caseloads.

Your law firm’s calls are transferred to you, your law partners, and paralegals. If missed, voicemail messages are instantly emailed to you, so no inquiry by potential clients is lost. You will also have two customizable voicemail boxes, ensuring plenty of space for all incoming voicemails.

Opus provides comprehensive mail-handling services that help your law firm stay organized while maintaining professional communication. Our staff safely stores your letters and packages until you are ready to pick them up. You can either collect them in person or have the option to forward them to a different address.

Attorneys and legal professionals across the country rely on Opus Virtual Offices to streamline operations, maintain a prestigious business address, and grow their practice without unnecessary overhead. Choose your city, set up your virtual office, and take control of your firm’s growth & success!

industry_content.main_heading: Professional communication. A trusted image. More hours for what matters most—your practice!
